Text: As always, very much appreciated. Thank you.

Thanks again mate , the reason why this is really helpful to me is I work shifts and sometimes its just not possible for me to get a newspaper .

YOU ARE A LEGEND SIR .
Well I appreciate The Sun for the big tits, but for the news I'd rather get the FT.  I have not had my fix for a week now.  Who knows, I may even read the Guardian one day.

awfully wanted please please please
